A6.text: Poetry by Sir Walter Raleigh, plus commentary

A7.text: He was to 'discover, search, find out, and view such remote heathen and barbarous Lands, Countries, and territories ... to have, hold, occupy, and enjoy'

A8.text: It was expected that Raleigh would establish a base from which to send privateers on raids against the treasure fleets of Spain
